dct_description_sm: Map of the division of George giving cadastral details including farm boundaries, farm names, the names of some farm owners, with dates and quitrent numbers. Also shown are divisional boundaries, trigonometrical stations, woods, forests (including forest reserves), rivers, dams and lakes. In addition the map gives the layout grids for the township of George and the village of Pacaltsdorp.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Cape Roods."

Inset maps: Africa, showing the east coast route and the Cape to Cairo railway. Scale [ca. 1: 25 344 000] -- Beira and district -- Maritzburg -- Durban -- East London -- Port Elizabeth -- Cape Town. Scale [1:804 672] -- Johannesburg -- Luderitzbucht.
